column1: Funeral Services will take place Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at Gephart Funeral Home
column4: Inc. Officiating will be Rev. Robert Schmidt from Zion Lutheran Church in Freeland with the committal following in Floral Gardens Cemetery. The family will be present at the funeral home on Tuesday from 4:00 to 8:00 p.m. and on Wednesday from 10:00 a.m. until the time of services to receive family and friends.
